VCheckbox.vType: Type to output the validity message
VCheckbox.vCheckedList: List of currently checked items (it should be the same length as `vCheckList` and mapped to the same index)
VCheckbox.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not
VCheckbox.vMessageClass: Class name to apply to the validity message
VCheckbox.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VColor.vType: Type to output the validity message
VColor.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not
VColor.vMessageClass: Class name to apply to the validity message
VColor.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VDate.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not
VDate.vMessageClass: Class name to apply to the validity message
VDate.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VEmail.vType: Type to output the validity message
VEmail.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not
VEmail.vLocateMessage: Where to attach the validity message element
VEmail.vMessageClass: Class name to apply to the validity message
VEmail.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VRadio.vType: Type to output the validity message
VRadio.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not

VRadio.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VRange.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message

VText.vType: Type to output the validity message
VText.vShowMessage: Whether to display the validity message or not
VText.vLocateMessage: Where to attach the validity message element
VText.vMessageClass: Class name to apply to the validity message
VText.vIsAnimate: Whether to apply animation when displaying the validity message
VText.vUseMaxLength: Whether to use the display of the maximum input value
VText.vClassMaxLength: Class name for the maximum input
